price: ߊ߬ ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߡߊ߲߬ߛߊ߬ߦߊߘߌ߫ ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ ߟߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
